mapper.select:
select ei.id, ei.user_id, ei.book_id, ei.score, ei.content, ei.create_date, ui.name as userName, ui.images as userImages, bi.name as bookName, bi.code as bookCode, bi.content, bi.update_date, bi.last_chapter, bi.`type`, ai.name as authorName, ai.images as authorImages from evaluate_info ei left join user_info ui on (ui.id = ei.user_id) left join book_info bi on (bi.id = ei.book_id) left join author_info ai on (ai.id = bi.author_id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluateInfo.userName},'%')
AND bi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluateInfo.bookName},'%')
AND ai.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluateInfo.authorName},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{ evaluateInfo.userId }
order by ei.create_date desc

select ei.id, ei.user_id, ei.book_id, ei.score, ei.content, ei.create_date, ui.name as userName, ui.images as userImages, bi.name as bookName, bi.code as bookCode, bi.content, bi.update_date, bi.last_chapter, bi.`type`, ai.name as authorName, ai.images as authorImages from evaluate_info ei left join user_info ui on (ui.id = ei.user_id) left join book_info bi on (bi.id = ei.book_id) left join author_info ai on (ai.id = bi.author_id) where 1 = 1 and ei.book_id = #{bookId} order by ei.create_date desc
